verses.verse: Praise <S%H1984><s%> the Lord! <S%H3050><s%> Praise <S%H1984><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> Praise <S%H1984><s%> Him, O servants <S%H5650><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%>
You who <S%H7945><s%> stand <S%H5975><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> In the courts <S%H2691><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of our God! <S%H430><s%>
Praise <S%H1984><s%> the Lord, <S%H3050><s%> for the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is good; <S%H2896><s%> Sing <S%H2167><s%> praises <S%H2167><s%> to His name, <S%H8034><s%> for it is lovely. <S%H5273><s%>
For the Lord <S%H3050><s%> has chosen <S%H977><s%> Jacob <S%H3290><s%> for Himself, Israel <S%H3478><s%> for His own possession. <S%H5459><s%>
For I know <S%H3045><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is great, <S%H1419><s%> And that our Lord <S%H136><s%> is above <S%H4480><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> gods. <S%H430><s%>

Whatever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> pleases, <S%H2654><s%> He does, <S%H6213><s%> In heaven <S%H8064><s%> and in earth, <S%H776><s%> in the seas <S%H3220><s%> and in all <S%H3605><s%> deeps. <S%H8415><s%>

He causes the vapors <S%H9347><s%> to ascend <S%H5927><s%> from the ends <S%H7097><s%> of the earth; <S%H776><s%> Who makes <S%H6213><s%> lightnings <S%H1300><s%> for the rain; <S%H4306><s%> Who brings <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> the wind <S%H7307><s%> from His treasuries. <S%H214><s%>
He smote <S%H5221><s%> the first-born of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> Both <S%H4480><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> and beast. <S%H929><s%>
He sent <S%H7971><s%> signs <S%H226><s%> and wonders <S%H4159><s%> into your midst, <S%H8432><s%> O Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> Upon Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his servants. <S%H5650><s%>
He smote <S%H5221><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> nations, <S%H1471><s%> And slew <S%H2026><s%> mighty <S%H6099><s%> kings, <S%H4428><s%>

Sihon, <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> And Og, <S%H5747><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> And all <S%H3605><s%> the kingdoms <S%H4467><s%> of Canaan; <S%H3667><s%>
And He gave <S%H5414><s%> their land <S%H776><s%> as a heritage, <S%H5159><s%> A heritage <S%H5159><s%> to Israel <S%H3478><s%> His people. <S%H5971><s%>
Thy name, <S%H8034><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> is everlasting, <S%H5769><s%> Thy remembrance, <S%H2143><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> throughout all <S%H1755><s%> generations. <S%H1755><s%>
For the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will judge <S%H1777><s%> His people, <S%H5971><s%> And will have <S%H5162><s%> compassion <S%H5162><s%> on His servants. <S%H5650><s%>
The idols <S%H6091><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%> are [but] silver <S%H3701><s%> and gold, <S%H2091><s%> The work <S%H4639><s%> of man's hands. <S%H3027><s%>
They have mouths, <S%H6310><s%> but they do not speak; <S%H1696><s%> They have eyes, <S%H5869><s%> but they do not see; <S%H7200><s%>
They have ears, <S%H241><s%> but they do not hear; <S%H238><s%> Nor <S%H369><s%> is there <S%H3426><s%> any <S%H3426><s%> breath <S%H7307><s%> at all <S%H637><s%> in their mouths. <S%H6310><s%>
Those who make <S%H6213><s%> them will be like <S%H3644><s%> them, [Yes,] everyone <S%H3605><s%> who <S%H834><s%> trusts <S%H982><s%> in them.
O house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> bless <S%H1288><s%> the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> O house <S%H1004><s%> of Aaron, <S%H175><s%> bless <S%H1288><s%> the Lord; <S%H3068><s%>
O house <S%H1004><s%> of Levi, <S%H3878><s%> bless <S%H1288><s%> the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> You who revere <S%H3372><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> bless <S%H1288><s%> the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the Lord <S%H3068><s%> from Zion, <S%H6726><s%> Who dwells <S%H7931><s%> in Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%> Praise <S%H1984><s%> the Lord! <S%H3050><s%>
